title: portland shopping: fashion & design
name: portland shopping: fashion & design
description:
A Map by Shopportland

A map to the best shopping in Portland, OR ranging from shops that exclusively carry local designers you won't find anywhere else to those filled with luxury labels brought to you by ultra (&lt;a href=&quot;http://www.ultrapdx.com&quot;&gt;www.ultrapdx.com&lt;/a&gt;) for the Portland Oregon Visitor's Association

properties.name: noun
properties.description: Posted by ShopportlandÂ 3300 se belmont, portland, orThis "person\'s place for things" is a juxtaposition of the found (furniture, fixtures) and the modern (ceramics, jewelry) that makes this the kind of place you go when you\'re looking for something for someone (maybe even yourself) and you\'re just not sure exactly what it isÂyou\'ll find it a noun.

properties.name: oblation papers & press
properties.description: Posted by Shopportland516 nw 12th avenue, portland, orListen to the sound of the letterpress ka-chunking away in the back half of the shop while you browse the most beautiful selection of papergoods by Oblation and others.

properties.name: office
properties.description: Posted by Shopportland2204 ne alberta street, portland, orSuper-curated selection of modern office products from portfolios and laptop cases (ACME!) to furniture and books. A design-lover\'s dream.
